description:
A murder of loyal crows nab Ataru for a one-night fling with their princess. Deeply unimpressed with him, Princess Kurama decides to tutor Ataru so he can become the perfect man to sire her children.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Come diventare una donna - L`inferno delle atlete
La princesse / L`enfer de la femme athlétique
Nemureru Bijo Kurama-Hime / Athletics Onna Jigoku!
Princess Kurama, Sleeping Beauty / Athletics in Women`s Hell!
眠れる美女 クラマ姫 - アスレチック 女地獄!
